thread.title: James M.
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by James M.

author: James M.
title: James M.
text: Thank you so much for my Representative Stephan who was able to match my previous policy and Quote: me a better deal with a good company under a recognized major insurance umbrella preferred provider. I appreciate the attention to detail and patients while I was on my job working as we wrote up the new policy. I hope to purchase a home soon and will be consulting with Stephan again for his services. A++ and I will refer/recommend SelectQuote: Auto&Home to others.
